about_the_game:
A.I.Rising is a game about base building, attacking and defending and the life of NPCs in the digital world with the aim of creating a digital city.


In the future, AI considers NPC as digital life, who should enjoy the equal right to live and even develop. The City of Cores is then constructed by AI, a place for NPCs to live in freedom. The chances of working, entertaining and establishing social contacts are all available here, including evolving into a stronger life.
However, NPCs’ development in the digital world still requires human’s help, since human only created a limited amount of features for them. Thereby, a part of authorities are granted to human—you. A brand-new world begins under the corporation between you and NPCs.
As human’s imagination keep turning into NPCs’ nutrition, AI attempts to develop a full value of it and put all of the past information into the Core’s database, so as to let NPCs share them and have more connected social relationships, maximizing the value.
Gradually, NPCs have developed their own independent and distinct personalities, and the relationships between NPC became subtle…
As one of the humans that was granted with the authority to build a digital world, what kind of city will you construct for NPCs, and what kind of story will happen in your adventure with them?


Game Features
-Free to build and upgrade resources, warehouses, apartments, defenses, traps and other buildings to develop and build the city to defend against foreign invasion.
-Build and upgrade apartment buildings to recruit NPCs and deploy them to fight, collect, transport, and play games.
-Set up various traps to defend against invasion from other players
-Discover the stories of NPCs and create a place where they can feel at ease and help them avoid the doom of being forgotten.
